MENSAJE CAN DE PRUEBA
(SIN STUFFING)

0 00000010100 0 000001 00000001 111011101010011 101 1111111 = 21998887325439

rellenado con unos 
00000100101000001000100000100111101110101001110111111111111111111111111111111111111 = 174806047990185013018623


0000000101000000001000000010100001100000001011111111

Arbtitration + RR (12)
000000101000 = 40 (adr = 20)

Control (6)
000001 = 1

Data (8*largo)
00000001 = 1

CRC (15)
111011101010011 = 30547

Con STUFFING

0 00000(1)010100 0 00(1)0001 00000(1)001 0100001100000(1)00 101 1111111 = 739456550966015
